Article Title: India squad for T20 World Cup: Shubman Gill dropped; Ishan Kishan included in 15-member squad
Article Text:
Suryakumar Yadav and Gautam Gambhir (BCCI Photo)

NEW DELHI:

Curious case! Why Ajit Agarkar & Co. continue to ignore Ishan Kishan

Full Squads

India T20Is vs New Zealand:

India T20 World Cup:

Chief selector Ajit Agarkar on Saturday announced India’s squads for the upcoming ICC T20 World Cup and the five-match T20I series against New Zealand. The T20I series will begin on January 21 in Nagpur and will serve as India’s final assignment in the format before the global tournament, scheduled from February 7 to March 8.India have been drawn in Group A for the T20 World Cup, alongside Namibia, the Netherlands, Pakistan, and the United States. The hosts will open their campaign against the USA on February 7 in Mumbai.Despite a lean run with the bat in the recently concluded T20I series against South Africa, which India won 3–1, Suryakumar Yadav has been entrusted with the captaincy for the marquee event. In 20 matches and 18 innings this year, Suryakumar has scored 213 runs at an average of 14.20, striking at just over 125, without registering a single half-century.Suryakumar Yadav (c), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson (wk), Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Jasprit Bumrah, Rinku Singh, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan KishanSuryakumar Yadav (c), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson (wk), Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Jasprit Bumrah, Rinku Singh, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan KishanIndia’s T20 World Cup squad sees some major changes. Notably, Shubman Gill , who was India’s vice-captain in the T20 setup, has been dropped, with all-rounder Axar Patel named as the new vice-captain.Gill had struggled to find form since opening the innings. Brought back into the playing XI as part of the management’s long-term leadership plan, his performances remained underwhelming. In 15 T20 matches since his comeback, Gill has scored 291 runs at an average of 24.25 and a strike rate of 137, failing to register a single fifty.Meanwhile, Sanju Samson, who had performed exceptionally well, including scoring three centuries as an opener, was moved down the order. His Asia Cup performance was mixed, though he finished as India’s third-highest run-scorer with 132 runs, behind Abhishek Sharma (314) and Tilak Varma (213). A solitary outing in Australia at No. 3 yielded little impact, after which Samson was dropped from the playing XI.In the last T20 against South Africa, Samson opened the innings again and scored a solid 37 off 22 balls, giving India a good start. The team management now plans to return to their original composition of playing a wicketkeeper at the top. Consequently, Jitesh Sharma has been dropped, and Ishan Kishan has been drafted as the second keeper.Ishan Kishan and Rinku Singh make the T20 World Cup squad, while Shubman Gill and Jitesh Sharma miss out. Kishan comes off a stellar domestic season in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, where he captained Jharkhand to their maiden T20 title. He finished the season as the highest run-scorer, amassing 517 runs in 10 games at an average of 57.44 and a strike rate of 197.
Article Summary: Ishan kishan and rinku singh make the t20 world cup squad, while shubman gill and jitesh sharma miss out. Suryakumar yadav has been entrusted with the captaincy for the marquee event. The five-match t20i series against new zealand will begin on january 21 in nagpur.

Article Title: Hardik Pandya's monster hit injures cameraman; ice pack, hug follow - WATCH
Article Text:
Hardilk Pandya immediately walked up to check on the cameraman’s well-being after his innings (Image credit: BCCI)

Why the Mumbai Maidans are being ignored? | Bombay Sport Exchange

NEW DELHI: India all-rounder Hardik Pandya produced a blistering display of power-hitting to lead India to a commanding 30-run victory over South Africa in the fifth and final T20I in Ahmedabad on Friday, sealing the five-match series 3-1. Pandya’s explosive knock set the tone as India piled up a daunting 231 for 5.Pandya smashed a 16-ball half-century — the second-fastest by an Indian in T20 internationals — on his way to a stunning 63 off just 25 deliveries. His innings was laced with five boundaries and five towering sixes.The carnage was complemented by Tilak Varma, who continued his rich vein of form with a fluent 73. Together, the duo stitched a punishing 105-run partnership for the fourth wicket that completely wrested momentum away from the visitors.One of Pandya’s massive sixes led to an unexpected moment off the field when the ball struck a cameraman stationed near the boundary.Showing concern beyond the contest, Pandya immediately walked up to check on the cameraman’s well-being after his innings, ensuring he was attended to and even helping apply an ice pack.Pandya also hugged the cameraman, a gesture that quickly went viral and earned widespread praise from fans.In reply, South Africa began positively and remained in the chase as long as Quinton de Kock was at the crease. The left-hander scored a fighting 65, but once he was dismissed, the innings unravelled rapidly. Varun Chakravarthy spun a web around the middle order, claiming four wickets as South Africa lost seven wickets for 81 runs to finish on 201 for 8.Pandya’s all-round impact and match-defining innings earned him the Player of the Match award."Winning games is what you play for and it’s always exciting when your contribution helps the team get over the line. No, I actually didn’t know (he has the second fastest fifty for India) until I got out and went back. Our social media guys told me I was the second-fastest," Pandya said.Watch the video here "My first reaction was, “Ah, I missed the top spot!” But happy that Yuvi pa holds that record. Today I just felt it. I actually told my partner beforehand that I was going to step out first ball and try to hit it for six. I was confident it would come off," he said."The situation suited my style; I backed myself and it worked. I took a calculated risk and thankfully it went my way. I’ve always enjoyed the challenge. No matter how many setbacks you face, the aim is to come back stronger, better, and make a bigger impact. When it all comes together, it feels satisfying. But the journey continues - the preparation, the planning, the hard work never stops," Pandya said.
Article Summary: India beat south africa by 30 runs in the fifth and final t20i in ahmedabad. All-rounder hardik pandya scored 63 off just 25 deliveries. Pandya's half-century was the second-fastest by an indian in t20 internationals.

Article Title: “Recovery isn’t optional” Why Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt says strength, not size, changed her in 2025
Article Text:
Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt opens up about gaining 15 lbs in 2025 and why strength and recovery mattered more than looks. (Image via Getty)

Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt says the 15-pound gain came from muscle, recovery, and long-term planning

Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt shares structured workouts, consistency advice, and public appearance at AmericaFest 2025

Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt is not playing into the optics game. She is controlling the message herself.Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt shared a candid breakdown of her 2025 fitness journey on social media this week, openly revealing that she gained about 15 pounds over the past year. The admission was not framed as a setback. It was framed as progress. Hunt said the change came from intentional training, metabolic reset, and a shift away from appearance-driven goals.Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt positioned the transformation as a long-term commitment to strength and sustainability. Her post focused on how her body performed, how her energy stabilized, and how patience replaced pressure.“My 2025 fitness goal was simple: become the strongest version of myself, inside and out,” she wrote.Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt made it clear that the year was not about restarting or chasing fast results. She said her approach changed once she prioritized training with intention and respecting recovery.“This year wasn’t about starting over. It was about getting smarter. Training with intention, thinking long-term, and learning that strength, balance, and longevity matter more than chasing quick results. I learned that recovery isn’t optional, it’s part of the work.”Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt later addressed the weight change directly and explained how it happened.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.“I reset my metabolism, fueled my body on purpose, and slowly recomposed, adding about 15 lbs of muscle since I began this journey.”She added that she stopped centering progress around appearance. Instead, she focused on how her body felt day to day, when to push, and when to pause. Hunt said the result was steadier energy and sharper focus as the year progressed.The post was paired with workout clips and set to music by The Weeknd, reinforcing the message without changing its tone. Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt closed the post by stating she ended the year stronger than she began it.Earlier in the week, Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt shared a separate post labeled “Training Tuesday,” showing an upper-body workout performed outdoors with dumbbells and a mat.“Upper body strength doesn’t have to be complicated. All you need is a set of dumbbells, a mat, and a commitment to show up,” she wrote.“Focus on controlled reps, strong posture, and breathing with intention,quality always beats quantity.”Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt also advised followers to keep workouts simple and repeatable, especially on busy days. She encouraged starting small rather than skipping sessions entirely.Later that week, Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt attended Turning Point USA’s AmericaFest in Phoenix. The event runs Dec. 18–21 at the Phoenix Convention Center and honors the legacy of Charlie Kirk, with programming led by his widow Erika Kirk. Hunt shared brief glimpses of the event on social media.While the Kansas City Chiefs continue to navigate an uneven close to the season under owner Clark Hunt, Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt ended 2025 on her own terms. She defined success by strength gained, habits built, and consistency maintained.“Finishing the year stronger than I started, and remembering that growth never really ends.”In other news, with injuries sidelining early picks, the spotlight shifts to rookie cornerback Nohl Williams as the Kansas City Chiefs face the Tennessee Titans. The third-round pick out of California has played in 14 games, handled a steady workload, and shown reliability as a tackler, even as his coverage remains a work in progress. With Trent McDuffie ruled out and Jaylen Watson nearing free agency, this matchup gives Williams a real chance to log heavy snaps and prove he can handle a bigger role when the stakes are low but the evaluation is very real.
Article Summary: Chiefs heiress gracie hunt shared a candid breakdown of her 2025 fitness journey on social media this week. She openly revealed that she gained about 15 pounds over the past year. Hunt said the change came from intentional training, metabolic reset, and a shift away from appearance-driven goals.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant’s net worth in 2025: Exploring wealth, legacy, and responsibility after Kobe Bryant’s untimely passing
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant (Image Via: Getty Images)

What is Vanessa Bryant's net worth as of 2025?

Inside Vanessa Bryants Life, House Tour, Net Worth

How Vanessa Bryant is turning loss into leadership and lasting impact, honouring late husband Kobe Bryant and daughter Gianna Bryant?

The late Lakers legend, Kobe Bryant’s widow, Venessa Bryant, is the executor of the vast financial legacy built during Kobe Bryant's iconic NBA career. In January 2020, Kobe Bryant and their daughter Gianna died in a helicopter crash. After Bryant’s passing in 2020, Vanessa Bryant inherited most of his money, including what he earned from basketball, endorsements, etc.Most of this wealth comes from his NBA salary, his investments, such as BodyArmor and their company, Bryant Stibel. Vanessa now manages these finances and makes important decisions about the family’s money. One major gain came from the sale of BodyArmor to Coca-Cola, which brought in a large amount of money for the family.As of 2025, Vanessa Bryant's net worth is estimated to be around $600 million as per Celebrity Net Worth. After Kobe Bryant’s sudden passing in 2020, Vanessa Bryant became the manager of his financial empire that he built, meaning she makes key decisions about how money and investments are handled. She continues to handle holdings in companies like BodyArmor, whose sale to Coca-Cola brought huge financial gains to the Bryant family.Vanessa also manages real estate and other assets inherited from Kobe. In 2023, Vanessa Bryant won a nearly $29 million lawsuit settlement against Los Angeles County over privacy violations after the crash. She chose to donate the money to the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation.Following Kobe Bryant’s untimely passing in 2020, Vanessa Bryant took charge of handling his financial affairs. She looks after the earnings from his basketball career, brand deals, and business interests. Much of the family’s wealth comes from well-planned investments like BodyArmor and Bryant Stibel.After Kobe Bryant’s tragic death in 2020, Vanessa Bryant became the sole person responsible for managing his financial legacy. She handles and manages income earned from his NBA career, endorsements, and business ventures. A large part of the family’s wealth comes from his investments, including BodyArmor and Bryant Stibel, with the BodyArmor sale proving especially significant.Additionally, one of Vanessa Bryant’s key roles is serving as the President and CEO of Granity Studios, the multimedia company Kobe Bryant founded. Under her leadership, the company keeps producing books, shows, and creative content inspired by Kobe’s vision.She also launched Mambacita clothing in 2021, a project honoring her late daughter Gianna Bryant. All profits from the clothing business support her foundation’s programs for young athletes. Vanessa Bryant continues to lead the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation, a nonprofit that supports underserved youth athletes, along with managing ongoing brand partnerships with Nike and other key collaborators.Also Read: Kobe Bryant’s wife Vanessa Bryant shares a quiet Instagram glimpse of her new princess with 15.6 million followers
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant is the widow of late nba legend, kobe bryant. She inherited most of his money, including what he earned from basketball, endorsements, etc. Vanessa now manages these finances and makes important decisions about the family’s money. She continues to lead the mamba & mambacita sports foundation.

Article Title: ‘Thank you for lifting Patrick up’: Randi Mahomes’ gratitude filled response after Patrick Mahomes’ knee surgery makes fans feel included and cherished
Article Text:
Randi Mahomes thanks fans for their prayers as Patrick Mahomes begins rehab after season-ending knee surgery. (Image via Getty)

Patrick Mahomes’ injury, surgery, and the timeline Kansas City is now staring at

Randi Mahomes thanked supporters as Patrick Mahomes posted ‘why this had to happen’

Patrick Mahomes is already in rehab after a season-ending left knee injury, and his mom is making it clear she is reading every message that comes in. Randi Mahomes posted public thanks this week after the Kansas City Chiefs quarterback underwent surgery, telling supporters she and her family appreciate the prayers and the words of encouragement.The update lands at the worst possible moment for Kansas City. Mahomes tore his left ACL and LCL in Week 15 against the Los Angeles Chargers, and the loss pushed the Chiefs out of playoff contention for the first time in the Mahomes era.Athlon Sports reported Mahomes suffered the injury against the Chargers and later underwent surgery on Monday. The report said the procedure was performed by Dallas Cowboys head physician and orthopedic surgeon Dan Cooper. Kansas City placed Mahomes on injured reserve, and the quarterback has already begun rehab.The medical timeline matters because it shapes everything the Chiefs do next. Chiefs vice president of sports medicine and performance Rick Burkholder said the recovery expectation is nine months, though it could swing by a month or two in either direction, per USA Today. That puts Mahomes’ 2026 season availability at the center of every offseason decision, even if the team stays quiet publicly.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Mahomes’ injury also closes the book on a season where he still produced. Athlon Sports noted he recorded 22 passing touchdowns and five rushing scores in 2025 before the knee gave out. Now the conversation shifts from stats to survival: how Kansas City steadies itself without the player it has been built around, and how quickly Mahomes can get back to full strength.The Chiefs missing the playoffs is the loudest headline. Athlon Sports called the Chargers loss the final blow to Kansas City’s postseason hopes. It is also a rare swing in the Mahomes era. Andy Reid’s teams had been a January constant, and Athlon Sports noted Kansas City reached the Super Bowl five times in the last six seasons, winning three. That is the standard Mahomes and the Chiefs are judged by, and it is why this injury lands like a crisis instead of a routine rehab story.The emotional side of this hit the public right away. TMZ reported Mahomes posted a message on X after the injury report became public, and he did not try to dress it up.“Don’t know why this had to happen,” Mahomes wrote. “And not going to lie, it’s hurts. But all we can do now is Trust in God and attack every single day over and over again.” He also addressed the fan base directly in the same TMZ report.“Thank you, Chiefs kingdom, for always supporting me and for everyone who has reached out and sent prayers. I will be back stronger than ever.”TMZ noted Randi Mahomes shared his message with a heart and prayer emoji, and her own posts kept the focus on gratitude. Athlon Sports reported she wrote a public message while also sharing about her “Home for the Holidays” event for the Kansas City community.“Thank you all for the prayers and kind messages for Patrick. We truly appreciate every one of them,” she wrote.Athlon Sports also reported she added a second note on her Instagram Stories. “Thank you for lifting Patrick up in prayer. We’re so thankful for this community.”That is the cleanest read on the moment. The family is not selling false optimism. They are acknowledging reality, leaning on faith, and keeping the message tight: Mahomes has surgery behind him, rehab in front of him, and a fan base watching every step.For the Chiefs, the next part is not dramatic. It is practical. Mahomes’ rehab is the story now, and the rest of the roster gets judged by how it responds to life without him. The one piece of good news, per Athlon Sports, is that Mahomes is on track to return to full health when the 2026 NFL season comes around. The rest is patience, and nine months can feel like forever when you are Kansas City.Moreover, Travis Kelce addressed speculation about his future with Patrick Mahomes on Friday, Dec. 19, after reporters asked whether the two might no longer play together following Mahomes’ season-ending knee injury. The 36-year-old Kansas City Chiefs tight end called the idea hard to process, responding, “Oh man, that’s crazy,” before making it clear his focus remains on the team. Kelce acknowledged this is “a unique time” in his career but stressed that he is locked in on finishing the season strong, saying he wants the attention on winning games and supporting the locker room rather than discussing what comes next.What's interesting is that the Tennessee Titans host the Kansas City Chiefs on Dec. 21 at Nissan Stadium, still searching for their first home win in 413 days after last winning in Nashville on Nov. 3, 2024, against the New England Patriots. Tennessee faces a rare opportunity against a Chiefs team already eliminated from playoff contention and without Patrick Mahomes, who suffered ACL and LCL tears last week. Gardner Minshew is set to start at quarterback, leading most analysts to expect a close, low-scoring game with mixed predictions on whether the Titans can finally snap their home losing streak.Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes is dealing with more than a standard ACL injury, and one overlooked detail could quietly shape how his recovery unfolds. Team officials revealed that Mahomes also suffered an avulsion injury to his LCL, meaning the ligament pulled a small piece of bone away with it, which required quick surgical repair. According to orthopedic surgeon Dr. Matt Anderson, this type of injury can actually be favorable because it allows for bone-to-bone healing and keeps the ligament itself intact, though it can slow the early stages of rehab. The added ligament damage may make the first few months more restrictive, but doctors do not expect it to significantly change Mahomes’ long-term outlook or his projected return timeline for the 2026 NFL season.
Article Summary: Randi mahomes thanks fans for their prayers as patrick mahomes begins rehab after season-ending knee surgery. Mahomes tore his left acl and lcl in week 15 against the los angeles chargers. Chiefs vice president of sports medicine and performance rick burkholder said the recovery expectation is nine months.

Article Title: Who is Sidney Crosby’s girlfriend? Details on Pittsburgh Penguins star's life with Kathy Leutner
Article Text:
Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner (Image Via Twitter)

Sidney Crosby 15 years long relationship with girlfriend Kathy Leutner

Details on Sidney Crosby Pittsburgh Penguins relationship status with Kathy Leutner

People have thought for a long time that Sidney Crosby is one of the best ice hockey players of his time, and he is a well-known NHL player because he has won multiple Stanley Cups and personal awards as the captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins. Fans pay a lot of attention to what he does on the ice, but not much is known about his personal life.Many Penguins fans are interested in Crosby's relationship with Kathy Leutner. Rumors say that the couple has been together for more than fifteen years and has helped each other through the ups and downs of their careers. Leutner has been to some of Crosby's games, cheering from the sidelines and showing unwavering support, even though they try to stay out of the spotlight.A mutual friend set up Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner on a date in 2008, and their love story began; Crosby was making waves in his third NHL season at the time, and Leutner was working on her modeling career. The couple chose to keep their relationship private from the start, avoiding social media and public attention.Leutner, who is from Chantilly, Virginia, started modeling in 2005 and became well-known after appearing in Sports Illustrated in 2011, and since then, she has worked with well-known brands like Abercrombie & Fitch, Hollister, and Faviana, showing that she is a successful professional in her own right.They both love sports, which helped their friendship grow over the years. Crosby has won three Stanley Cups, two Hart Memorial Trophies as the league's best player, and many other awards during his long career. Leutner has always been there for him, going to games and celebrating milestones with him.Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner have been together for a long time, and their story is still a great example of how to support, trust, and work together in the high-pressure world of professional sports.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Toronto Maple Leafs captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Sidney crosby and kathy leutner have been together for more than fifteen years. The couple chose to keep their relationship private from the start, avoiding social media and public attention. Crosby has won three stanley cups, two hart memorial trophies as the league's best player, and many other awards during his long career.

Article Title: Record! Smriti Mandhana creates history, becomes first Indian woman cricketer to ...
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana (Photo: PTI)

Suryakumar Yadav talks about his horrible form with the bat | T20 World Cup

Indian star batter Smriti Mandhana created history during the first Women’s T20I match against Sri Lanka in Visakhapatnam on Sunday. The left-handed opener achieved a major milestone and entered an elite list in women’s T20 international cricket.Mandhana became the first Indian woman cricketer to score more than 4,000 runs in T20Is. This is a huge achievement for Indian cricket Overall, she is only the second woman in the world to reach this landmark.New Zealand legend Suzie Bates is the only other player to do so and currently has 4,716 runs in the format.What makes Mandhana’s record even more special is the speed at which she achieved it. She reached the 4,000-run mark in just 3,227 balls, which is faster than Suzie Bates, who took 3,675 balls to get there.This shows how consistent and attacking Mandhana has been over the years in T20 cricket.In the match against Sri Lanka, Mandhana scored 25 runs off 25 balls. She was dismissed in the ninth over while chasing a target of 122 runs.Even though her innings was short, it was enough for her to reach the historic milestone.This was also her first international appearance since India’s famous win in the ODI World Cup final last month, where they defeated South Africa to lift their maiden title.Earlier in the match, the Indian bowlers delivered a disciplined performance and restricted Sri Lanka to 121 runs for six wickets. The Sri Lankan batters struggled to take advantage of loose deliveries and failed to build strong partnerships.Opener Vishmi Gunaratne was the top scorer for Sri Lanka with 39 runs off 43 balls. Hasini Perera and Harshitha Samarawickrama also contributed with scores of 20 and 21 respectively.Sri Lanka captain Chamari Athapaththu started aggressively but was dismissed by young pacer Kranti Gaud, giving India an early breakthrough.India’s bowlers kept things tight in the middle overs despite the presence of dew, which made gripping the ball difficult.Deepti Sharma bowled economically, while debutant Vaishnavi Sharma impressed everyone with a calm and controlled spell and gave away very few runs.
Article Summary: Smriti mandhana became the first indian woman cricketer to score more than 4,000 runs in t20is. She is only the second woman in the world to reach this landmark. Suzie bates is the only other player to do so and currently has 4,716 runs.

Article Title: Brittany Mahomes stays silent as Randi Mahomes steps up with a message of hope during Patrick Mahomes’ recovery
Article Text:
Patrick Mahomes’ season-ending knee injury has left the Chiefs in unfamiliar territory. While Brittany Mahomes has remained silent, his mother Randi publicly thanked fans for their prayers and support. As Mahomes begins a lengthy rehabilitation, the Chiefs face a rare playoff miss but remain optimistic about his full recovery and return in 2026.

Randi Mahomes’ message brings calm as the Chiefs face a rare turning point

It feels like a strange place for the Kansas City Chiefs to be in, and the emotions of this moment stretch far beyond the field. Patrick Mahomes' season-ending knee injury has changed everything from the Chiefs' outlook on making the playoffs to bringing attention toward how his family is handling such a difficult time.Brittany Mahomes has avoided addressing the public, but Patrick's mother, Randi Mahomes, has been a steady and reassuring voice for fans.Following surgery to repair torn ACL and LCL ligaments in his left knee, which abruptly ended his 2025 season, Patrick Mahomes formally started his rehabilitation. Randi Mahomes spoke to fans directly as concerns about the Chiefs' future circulate, expressing gratitude for the emotional support her son has received.“Thank you all for the prayers and kind messages for Patrick. We truly appreciate every one of them,” she wrote.Her message resonated with a fan base that wasn't used to disappointment. Expectations are extremely high due to Kansas City's dynasty-era dominance, and it is shocking for Mahomes to miss the playoffs for the first time. Those close to the team, however, maintain that fear is unfounded.Patrick Mahomes' recovery is expected to take about nine months, according to team doctors, keeping him on track for a full return in 2026.Chiefs officials are still optimistic that Mahomes' legacy won't be defined by this setback because of his work ethic and access to modern medical care.For the time being, Randi's appreciation and Brittany's silence both convey the same message: healing comes first. Despite the uncertainty surrounding the Chiefs' future, faith in their quarterback has remained unwavering..Also Read: Brittany Mahomes stuns fans in holiday glam that subtly nods to her SI Swimsuit breakthrough
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes' season-ending knee injury has left the chiefs in unfamiliar territory. While brittany mahomes has remained silent, his mother randi publicly thanked fans for their prayers and support. The chiefs face a rare playoff miss but remain optimistic about his full recovery and return in 2026.

Article Title: Who is Chris Oladokun? The little-known quarterback becoming the Chiefs’ surprise solution after Patrick Mahomes’ injury scare
Article Text:
Who is Chris Oladokun (Getty Images)

Who is Chris Oladokun for the Kansas City Chiefs



Kansas City Chiefs fans did not expect this December twist, but the season has demanded fast answers. With Patrick Mahomes sidelined and Gardner Minshew unable to finish the Week 16 battle in Tennessee, the franchise has turned to a name few outside Kansas City know well. The moment arrived suddenly, under pressure, and with playoff urgency still hanging in the air.In a year shaped by injuries and improvisation, the Chiefs are now leaning on continuity rather than star power. The choice reflects trust built quietly over time. Chris Oladokun has lived inside this system, studied it, and waited for a chance that seemed unlikely to come. Now, with the final stretch ahead, the ball is in his hands and the spotlight is no longer avoidable.Chris Oladokun’s path to this moment is anything but ordinary. He spent seven seasons in college football, moving through South Florida, Samford, and South Dakota State. His breakthrough came in 2021 at South Dakota State, where he finally earned a starting role and delivered results. Oladokun guided the Jackrabbits to an 11–4 record, throwing 25 touchdowns against seven interceptions while showing command and calm in pressure moments.The NFL did not roll out a red carpet. The Pittsburgh Steelers selected him in the seventh round of the 2022 draft, but his stay was short. After final roster cuts, Kansas City offered him a quieter opportunity. Oladokun joined the practice squad, learned the playbook, and absorbed the culture of a championship locker room. That decision changed everything.He earned two Super Bowl rings with the Chiefs and built trust with coaches by staying ready even when game days passed without action. His first NFL snaps came in 2024 against the Broncos, a brief appearance that showed his mobility but offered little chance to throw.Sunday in Tennessee was different. When Minshew went down, Oladokun stepped in and delivered a composed performance. He completed 11 of 16 passes for 111 yards and posted an 88.3 passer rating. The stat line mattered, but the poise mattered more. He ran the offense, protected the football, and kept the huddle steady in a difficult road environment.Now, with injuries reshaping the depth chart, Oladokun stands as the likely starter. His deep knowledge of the system gives the Kansas City Chiefs stability at a time when chaos would be easy. On Christmas night at Arrowhead, the moment will test him fully. For Oladokun, it is not about proving he belongs. He has already stayed long enough to earn the chance.Also Read: Who is Aaron Rodgers’ wife Brittani: Everything you need to know as Steelers QB's marriage mystery deepens
Article Summary: Chris oladokun was drafted by the pittsburgh steelers in 2022. He spent seven seasons in college football, moving through south florida, samford, and south dakota state. He earned two super bowl rings with the chiefs and built trust with coaches by staying ready even when game days passed.

Article Title: “I have the most incredible wife”: Aaron Rodgers’ heartfelt words about his wife deepen the mystery around his private life
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers has confirmed he is married but continues to keep his wife, Brittani, completely out of the public eye. His heartfelt comments describing her as “incredible” have fueled curiosity, especially with no photos or appearances to confirm her identity. Rodgers’ rare openness highlights a deeply private love story unfolding away from the spotlight.

Why Aaron Rodgers’ quiet love story continues to fascinate fans

Aaron Rodgers is not only a great quarterback in the NFL, he is also among the most discussed players of the league as he is controversial due to his frankness, individuality, and weirdness in his approach to fame.In early 2025, the Pittsburgh Steelers star stated that he was married but did not want people to know much about his wife. Her name is Brittani, but even after months of curiosity, she has not been seen. She has no photos, no appearances in the media, no social media posts. Such silence has only given people increased curiosity which has turned the personal life of Rodgers into one of the most confusing off-field stories of the NFL.Steelers star Aaron Rodgers shocked fans in December 2024 when he announced that Brittani was his girlfriend on The Pat McAfee Show. June 2025, the interest increased when he visited the Steelers facility wearing a wedding ring and this confirmed they were married although he had failed to announce it publicly but Rodgers offered no public details.However, during Steelers training camp in July, Rodgers opened up emotionally in an interview with NFL Network, offering his clearest insight yet into his marriage.“When you meet the right one, and you’re with the right one, your whole world changes in a second,” he said. “And to have that person that unconditionally loves you behind the scenes, there's no better feeling in the world, and I have the most incredible wife. I just really love her.”Rodgers did not talk a lot or idealize his relationship. He instead concentrated more on emotional foundation, support and personal development as Brittani proves that she maintains things in the background.Aaron Rodgers puts a stark contrast between his image in the public and his personal tranquility by maintaining the privacy of his marriage. When being seen can be a way of being proven correct, Rodgers has proven to be the best player in the game and has shown that sometimes being silent and not showing everything is best.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers’ mystery marriage raises questions after Olivia Munn reveals what she endured
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers has confirmed he is married but continues to keep his wife, brittani, completely out of the public eye. His heartfelt comments describing her as “incredible” have fueled curiosity, especially with no photos or appearances to confirm her identity. Rodgers’ rare openness highlights a deeply private love story unfolding away from the spotlight.

Article Title: Maple Leafs fans on edge after reporter claims Auston Matthews trade talks may be closer than believed
Article Text:
Auston Matthews trade rumor (Getty Images)

Auston Matthews and the pressure point Toronto cannot ignore

The mood around the Maple Leafs has shifted from confidence to caution. Toronto entered the season expecting its captain to set the pace, yet nights now pass where the scoreboard stays silent for stretches that feel unfamiliar. Auston Matthews still generates chances, still competes hard in all three zones, but goals no longer arrive with the same inevitability. In a market that measures greatness shift by shift, that absence has grown louder than any cheer.What makes this moment heavier is timing. Toronto is not rebuilding or experimenting. This is a team built to win now. When production stalls at the center of that plan, anxiety spreads quickly. Conversations that once felt unthinkable are now whispered openly, not because Matthews has fallen off, but because expectations around him remain sky high.The tension spiked when Maple Leafs reporter Howard Berger suggested the organization will not move forward until Auston Matthews asks for a trade, possibly by this year’s trade deadline. That idea alone rattled the fanbase. Matthews has been the franchise constant for nearly a decade.Imagining Toronto without him feels like pulling a load-bearing wall from the house.On the ice, the frustration has roots. Auston Matthews continues to win faceoffs, backcheck, and handle defensive responsibility. Yet Toronto pays him to swing games offensively. At five-on-five, his line has not consistently owned shifts. On the power play, the dominance that once felt automatic has faded into predictability. The looks are there, but the finish has gone missing.That gap between effort and outcome feeds scrutiny. In Toronto, leadership is judged through goals when the stakes rise. When scoring dries up, every shift becomes a test of authority and legacy. Nick Kypreos tried to strike a more hopeful tone in the Toronto Star, but optimism struggles to breathe when results lag behind reputation.The coaching staff has searched for answers. Different wingers, altered looks, and tactical tweaks have come and gone. The puck still moves well, but the instinctive scoring touch that defined Matthews has not returned with consistency. There is also quiet talk of tension with coach Craig Berube, another layer that complicates an already delicate situation.Trading a captain in his prime is not standard practice. Neither is standing still while doubt grows inside a contender. Toronto management now faces a narrow path where action and inaction both carry consequences. Whether Berger’s report proves prophetic or premature, it captures how fragile this stretch feels.Matthews remains elite. Yet in this market, elite alone no longer settles the noise. The next few months will decide more than standings. They will define how this era is remembered, and whether Auston Matthews and Toronto find clarity together or part under pressure. Maple Lead's season has not been up to their mark and there will be few shake-up in near future.Also Read: Are Auston Matthews and Craig Berube drifting apart as Maple Leafs struggles spark tense locker-room speculation?
Article Summary: The mood around the maple leafs has shifted from confidence to caution. Auston matthews still generates chances, still competes hard in all three zones, but goals no longer arrive with the same inevitability. In a market that measures greatness shift by shift, that absence has grown louder than any cheer.

Article Title: Seth Jarvis injury update: Carolina Hurricanes star expected to miss significant time after undisclosed setback, Rod Brind’Amour confirms
Article Text:
Seth Jarvis sidelined after injury against Panthers (Image via: Getty Images)

How Seth Jarvis’ injury could impact the Carolina Hurricanes’ season



Seth Jarvis’ injury has sent a push through the Carolina Hurricanes’ season at a time when consistency and scoring depth were all that mattered. The forward went down hard in overtime against the Florida Panthers at Amerant Bank Arena, and the result is worrying for the team as he is set to be “out for a while,” as per the head coach Rod Brind’Amour.The moment unfolded quickly and brutally. Twenty seconds into overtime, Jarvis drove hard to the net while being pressured by Evan Rodrigues and crashed full speed into the left post. He could not get back to his feet on his own, needed support to leave the ice, and disappeared. Brind’Amour did not sugarcoat it afterward, calling the injury “not good,” leaving Carolina fans concerned about a significant absence.Before the injury, Jarvis was not just another piece of the lineup. He was one of the Hurricanes’ most productive forwards this season, sitting second on the team with 29 points from 19 goals and 10 assists in just 34 games. He also delivered two assists in that very game, helping Carolina race to a 3-0 lead before Florida fought back, forced overtime, and eventually won 4-3 in a shootout. Losing a player producing at that level is a major competitive blow.Beyond current form, Jarvis has been a central part of Carolina’s offense in recent years.The 23-year-old star has already established himself as a well-renowned name in the NHL with 240 points under his belt and a pattern of upping his game come playoff time with 43 points in 55 postseason games. This particular skill of his makes the injury particularly troublesome with a Hurricane franchise still seeking consistency.With no fixed time frame on when he would return, Carolina finds himself dealing with lineups that will need some changes, new roles, and new players being called on to provide the same level of point production that Jarvis brings. His absence changes matchups, special-teams decisions, and overall offensive rhythm. For a team built on depth and structure, this is a real test. As the Hurricanes navigate the coming weeks, every update on Seth Jarvis will matter because his health could shape not only their immediate stretch of games but also the direction of their season.Also Read: Seth Jarvis injury update: Andrei Svechnikov’s high stick takes Hurricanes forward out with upper-body setback
Article Summary: Seth jarvis went down hard in overtime against the florida panthers. Head coach rod brind’amour called the injury “not good,” leaving carolina fans concerned about a significant absence. Jarvis was one of the hurricanes’ most productive forwards this season, sitting second on the team with 29 points.

Article Title: Montreal Canadiens bring back Phillip Danault from Los Angeles Kings in major trade move
Article Text:
Phillip Danault reunites with Montreal Canadiens (Image via: Getty Images)

The Montreal Canadiens’ strategy in bringing back Phillip Danault from Los Angeles Kings



The Montreal Canadiens have reacquired center Phillip Danault from the Los Angeles Kings in exchange for a second-round pick in the 2026 NHL Draft. Danault, 32, returns to the team where he played from 2015 through 2021, bringing familiarity, experience, and stability to Montreal’s lineup as the team looks to improve midseason.Danault’s return is straightforward: the Canadiens wanted to get better. Known for his defensive reliability and versatility, he can contribute at both ends of the ice. With one year remaining on his $5.5 million contract, Danault adds depth down the middle while mentoring younger players in Montreal’s roster.Danault was originally a first-round pick by the Chicago Blackhawks in 2011 and has since played 741 NHL games, scoring 399 points, including 125 goals and 274 assists. In 62 playoff games, he scored 28 points, proving his ability to perform in high-pressure scenarios.From 2015 to 2021, Danault recorded 194 points in 360 games with the Canadiens. He has five assists in 30 games this season with the Kings, but he does more than just score. He can handle challenging matchups against elite opponents and is a good defensive player who excels on penalty kills.Adding Phillip Danault to the lineup is also expected to bring some stability to the team's scoring lineup because Danault has extensive experience with the system used by the team.Danault’s experience with the Canadiens goes beyond the stats as well. He knows the locker room, the culture of the team, as well as the ability to mentor some of the young players. This will go a long way in maintaining some sort of balance, something the Canadiens would need as they make a push for the playoffs.In general, the Canadiens are doing what is required of them at this stage; this is because the team is looking for a trusted and seasoned center who can play the opposition from start to finish. The return of Danault is expected to boost the depth, veteran leadership, and overall performance of the Canadiens ahead of the playoffs.Also Read: NHL trade rumors: Phillip Danault linked with potential move from LA Kings as Montreal Canadiens, New Jersey Devils and Carolina Hurricanes emerge as top contendors
Article Summary: The montreal canadiens have reacquired center phillip danault from the los angeles kings in exchange for a second-round pick in the 2026 nhl draft. Danault, 32, returns to the team where he played from 2015 through 2021, bringing familiarity, experience, and stability to montreal’s lineup.

Article Title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce shift their attention elsewhere amid strong rumors of the Chiefs' tight end opting for retirement
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce remain silent amid all the trolling.(Image via Backgrid)

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are fully focused on their lavish wedding which is all set to happen in 2026



Taylor Swift had opened up about her wedding plans as Travis Kelce deals with retirement rumors



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are dealing with the star player’s retirement rumors as he gets heavily trolled amid an average season of the Kansas City Chiefs.But it seems the two are also looking into their wedding planning together, ahead of their lavish wedding in 2026.A few days ago, as per PEOPLE, a source has revealed that, "When it comes to wedding planning, nothing feels rushed or one-sided…”The source added, “They’re both equally involved and excited, and this isn’t something one or the other is carrying on their own.”According to PEOPLE, the source continued that, “They’re approaching it as a partnership, talking things through together and enjoying the process in a way that feels natural to them."Despite the public status of their relationship, both Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have remained tight lipped about their wedding plans, amid all the speculations.A few weeks ago, in October 2025, Taylor Swift appeared on the U.K.'s Heart Breakfast where she opened up about how she actually never thought about her wedding.Taylor Swift said, "You would think that I had been that type of person who would have obsessed over the idea of a wedding my whole life…”The popular billionaire pop star added, “But I actually never thought about what I would ever do or what I would want—until I met the person."The billionaire pop star has also hinted that the two would be planning a big wedding, while rumors suggest that Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce might be considering Italy to be their destination for the wedding.At this point in time, Travis Kelce is getting trolled while many experts and analysts have hinted that the Kansas City Chiefs’ tight end might just be announcing his retirement from the league soon.At the last match of the Kansas City Chiefs, when the team brutally lost against the Los Angeles Chargers, many members of the Kelce family along with Taylor Swift were present. This has sparked more rumors of a potential retirement as the team remains silent about it.Also Read: "You ruined my life": New court documents reveal disturbing details of what happened between Sherrone Moore and the woman he allegedly attacked
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce are fully focused on their lavish wedding which is all set to happen in 2026. A source revealed that, "when it comes to wedding planning, nothing feels rushed or one-sided…” the billionaire pop star has also hinted that the two would be planning a big wedding.

Article Title: Brandon Jones injury update: Broncos rally around defensive leader after heartbreaking season-ending setback
Article Text:
Brandon Jones (via Getty Images)

Broncos defense faces a major test, but Jones’ message sets the tone

The Denver Broncos’ Week 15 win felt like a very strong promise to see and envision a strong playoff push. However, the mood shifted once news broke that Brandon Jones would miss the rest of the season. The Denver Broncos safety suffered an unfortunate pectoral injury, which has now severely impacted what had been one of his most impactful years in the NFL Jones’ spirit and determination seem to be intact despite the injury, as seen in his new post on Instagram. He put up an inspiring and confident message, updating everyone that he was mentally strong. His statement earned the respect of fans, with many of his NFL friends cheering him on.Soon after the injury became official, Jones shared a powerful Instagram post reflecting on his journey with Denver. Alongside photos from the season, he wrote, “Different lane, same direction. God never misses.” His teammates and fans responded with immense enthusiasm, showing their full support while also admiring his perseverance.Jones earned that level of respect through his constant dedication and consistency. He managed to play nearly every defensive snap and proved to be extremely dependable in tackling and situational awareness. Edge rusher Nik Bonitto praised his post, while defensive tackle DJ Jones added, “We got you, cousin!!!”Former Miami Dolphins teammate Jevon Holland also chimed in with encouragement, writing, “The comeback!!” Kicker Wil Lutz and cornerback Riley Moss added their own messages of support, reflecting how widely Jones is valued across the roster.On the field, the challenge now falls to the rest of the defense to adjust quickly.P.J. Locke is expected to take on a larger role, and while his numbers are modest, the coaching staff believes he can step up within the system. It will not be easy to replace a player who handled so many responsibilities, but the Broncos are not viewing this moment as the end of their run.Jones’ absence is a serious blow, yet his determined mindset has already set the standard for the team. The defense plans to move forward with purpose, motivated by the idea of winning for a teammate who gave everything while he was on the field.Also read: Why did Denver Broncos decide to waive oldest tight end Mercedes Lewis just after 4 appearances
Article Summary: Denver broncos safety brandon jones has been ruled out for the rest of the season with a pectoral injury. Jones posted a message on instagram saying he was mentally strong despite the injury. His teammates and fans responded with immense enthusiasm, showing their full support while also admiring his perseverance.

Article Title: NBA injury update: Anthony Davis pushes through illness as Dallas Mavericks search for spark ahead of Philadelphia 76ers clash
Article Text:
Anthony Davis is currently ill (Image via NBA)

Anthony Davis powers through illness as Dallas Mavericks prepare for tough road test against Philadelphia 76ers

Anthony Davis’ long-term future in Dallas faces fresh doubt as trade talk grows louder

The Dallas Mavericks, who have an uncomfortable 11-17 record and are ranked 11th in the West, will play the Philadelphia 76ers tonight. Throughout the season, the Mavs have appeared disconnected from success. Cooper Flagg, their newest recruit, had a difficult rookie season, and Anthony Davis, Luka Doncic's successor, is probably going to be replaced shortly.Despite being in challenging physical condition, Davis performed admirably in a victory against the Detroit Pistons last time out. Despite having a damaged left calf and an illness, the Mavericks big man continued to play a lot of minutes and had a great influence despite missing a recent game due to the ailment.On Saturday night, the Philadelphia 76ers (15-11) will play the Dallas Mavericks (11-17) in the second half of a back-to-back game. The upcoming 25th Anniversary Celebration Game, which is sponsored by Crypto.com and has a retro Hardwood Classic theme, will begin at Xfinity Mobile Arena at 7 p.m. ET.Without Anthony Davis, Dallas defeated the Detroit Pistons 116-114 in overtime on Thursday. With 23 points and 10 rebounds, top choice Cooper Flagg—who turns 19 on Sunday—recorded his fourth NBA double-double.The last time out, Davis made a valiant attempt against the Detroit Pistons. Despite nearly missing the game, Davis played a significant amount of time and finished with an outstanding 15 points, 18 rebounds, and 3 blocks in an overtime victory.In 37 minutes of action, he ended with 15 points, 18 rebounds, and 3 blocks to help the Mavs win 116-114 in overtime on Thursday. Davis stated after the game that although he is still feeling under the weather, he did his best to support his team's victory.“Still feel under the weather,” Davis said. “I actually threw up twice during the game, but I’m just trying to compete. I’m just trying to do whatever I can to help the team win. Just leaving it all on the floor.”The Mavs will now travel to Philadelphia on Saturday to play the 76ers. Despite his illness, Davis is listed as probable for the forthcoming game. This season, Davis has made 12 appearances and averaged 19.6 points, 10.8 rebounds, 3.1 assists, and 1.8 blocks per contest.It's possible that Anthony Davis' future in Dallas won't be as unclear as the Mavericks would like. Despite Dallas's public indications that an extension might still be in the works, ESPN's Tim MacMahon stated this week that he anticipates Davis being dealt.“The Mavericks are telling people, ‘Oh, we still might extend him this summer,’” MacMahon said. “If you do that, that’s not gonna be good business for the Mavericks. I’m being told that and I don’t believe that.“I’ll put it like that. I think it’s a matter of when and not if Anthony Davis is traded. I just don’t know when.”Davis may be the most likely trade departure since he gives the Bulls the most opportunity to recover choices, according to Sam Quinn of CBS Sports.“A trade seemed certain the moment Nico Harrison was fired. Now, there’s a bit of uncertainty. The Mavericks are playing well. Kyrie Irving could return. Could Harrison’s dream be fulfilled by his successors? That’s the question mark here,” Quinn wrote.In August, Davis will be eligible for a four-year deal worth a maximum of $275 million. In addition to earning $54.1 million this season and $58.5 million the following year, he has a $62.8 million player option for 2027–2028.Also read: NBA injury update: Dallas Mavericks guard Dante Exum ruled out for entire season after knee surgery
Article Summary: The dallas mavericks, who have an uncomfortable 11-17 record and are ranked 11th in the west, will play the philadelphia 76ers tonight. Cooper flagg, their newest recruit, had a difficult rookie season, and anthony davis, luka doncic's successor, is probably going to be replaced shortly.

Article Title: Tee Higgins injury update: Cincinnati Bengals WR’s brutal concussion has a positive update as the team gears up to face the Miami Dolphins
Article Text:
Tee Higgins sustained brutal concussions in this season.(Image via Getty Images)

Tee Higgins’ brutal concussion has a positive update as the Cincinnati Bengals gear up to face the Miami Dolphins

What happened to Tee Higgins as the Cincinnati Bengals recorded a poor season?

Tee Higgins, the Cincinnati Bengals’ star player, has remained missing from the field ever since he sustained a brutal concussion against the Buffalo Bills for the second time in this new season.While Tee Higgins’ injury had sparked panic among fans, there have been a few new developments as the Cincinnati Bengals gear up to face the Miami Dolphins on Sunday night.In the last few days, the Cincinnati Bengals’ star wide receiver has been a limited participant in the practice sessions.As per reports, Tee Higgins was recorded as a limited participant on Wednesday and Thursday. But it seems, things changed on Friday as he became a full participant in the practice session as the team geared up for Sunday night’s match against the Miami Dolphins.A few hours ago, Tee Higgins was listed as questionable for tomorrow’s match amid strong speculations of him being able to take the field against the Miami Dolphins.However, neither the team, the Cincinnati Bengals, nor Tee Higgins has responded to these speculations as they continue to be silent about this.While the Cincinnati Bengals recorded a pretty poor season on the field, Tee Higgins suffered quite a bit in this season as he sustained two concussions in a span of a few weeks.For the unversed, a few weeks ago, the team’s star wide receiver, Tee Higgins, sustained a concussion and had to miss the first round of the match against the Baltimore Ravens, which the Cincinnati Bengals had won.However, Tee Higgins was placed on concussion protocol and he ended up clearing it on 5th December to face the Buffalo Bills.As he geared up to play against the Buffalo Bills, Tee Higgins had opened up about his injury.The Cincinnati Bengals popular player said, "It was very scary…Any head injury is very scary. Thank God that I'm able to play again this weekend and keep playing for the rest of the season."Unfortunately, as luck would have it, Tee Higgins suffered a second concussion at the match against the Buffalo Bills as his head slammed into the ground.Also Read: Micah Parsons injury update: Insider reveals concerning details about his return next season amid the Green Bay Packers’ tough stretch
Article Summary: Tee higgins sustained a brutal concussion against the buffalo bills. The cincinnati bengals star wide receiver has been a limited participant in the practice sessions. On friday, tee higgins became a full participant as the team geared up for sunday night’s match against the miami dolphins.

Article Text:
Luka Doncic of the Los Angeles Lakers (Image via Getty)

Luka Doncic goes into Saturday night without a clear answer attached to his name. He is not listed as out or questionable for the Lakers’ December 20 game against the Clippers, which usually points toward availability. Still, the situation is not clean. The Lakers are short-handed, and Doncic has dealt with small interruptions this season that make any appearance worth monitoring.Since arriving in February 2025, Doncic has carried a heavy load. The Los AngelesLakers depend on him to organize the offense, control pace, and close games. With the roster thinned by injuries, his presence or absence matters more than usual.The Lakers and Clippers meet again at Crypto.com Arena, a matchup that rarely needs added context. Both teams are chasing position in the West, and games like this often matter later when tiebreakers surface. If Doncic plays, the Lakers lean on his steady production, around 35 points, eight rebounds, and nine assists per game, alongside LeBron James, who is not listed on the injury report.There is no official injury keeping Luka Doncic off the floor. That stands out after earlier absences tied to personal reasons and minor issues such as a finger sprain.He remains the focal point of the offense and recently finished with 29 points in a win despite an uneven shooting night. His conditioning work has helped him handle long stretches with the ball, and if he plays, the Lakers expect him to run the game.Los Angeles Lakers are missing several rotation players, which tightens the margin for error.With Reaves and Vincent unavailable, ball-handling duties fall even more heavily on Doncic and James.The Clippers are also dealing with absences across the lineup.If James Harden plays, he becomes a direct matchup concern in isolation.
Article Summary: Luka doncic is not listed as out or questionable for the lakers’ december 20 game against the clippers, which usually points toward availability. The lakers are missing several rotation players, which tightens the margin for error. With reaves and vincent unavailable, ball-handling duties fall even more heavily on doncic and lebron james.

Article Title: David Pastrnak and Rebecca Rohlsson’s love life: A look into the personal life, marriage, and family of the Boston Bruins right winger
Article Text:
David Pastrňák and Rebecca Rohlsson (Image Source: Getty)

David Pastrnak and Rebecca Rohlsson’s married life

David Pastrnak And Girlfriend, Rebecca Rohlsson, Expecting A Baby!

David Pastrnak and Rеbеcca Rohlsson’s family

What does Rebecca Rohlsson do for a living?

Also read:

David Pastrnak is regarded as one of the NHL's star offensive players, who has been associated with the Boston Bruins in a long-term contract. In 2023, he signed an eight-year, $90 million deal with the Bruins, making him one of the NHL’s elite. Pastrnak is a Czech professional ice hockey right winger and alternate captain for the Boston Bruins of the NHL.Known for his unparalleled skills, unique goal-scoring abilities, and vision on the ice, he is one of the most prominent players who has gained not only fame, but a handsome amount of wealth as well. Besides maintaining a good rapport and balance in the team, Pastrnak has also maintained his personal and family life with the love of his life, Rebecca Rohlsson. Let’s explore the right-winger’s personal life, his family, marriage, love life, and more.David Pastrnak married Rebecca Rohlsson last year, and it was a private affair between close friends and family members. According to reports, the couple tied the knot in August 2024 at the Cathedral of St. Stephen in Croatia. The couple started dating and has been together for six years, until they disclosed their relationship in the year 2018.Reports suggest Rebecca is two years older than David Pastrnak, who was 28, at the time of their wedding. Though it was kept private, the ceremony was attended by many of Pastrnak’s current and former teammates, including David Krejci and Torey Krug, who served as groomsmen.Some other guests included Bruins players Brad Marchand, Charlie McAvoy, Jeremy Swayman, and Hampus Lindholm, along with former Bruins stars Patrice Bergeron, Zdeno Chara, and Linus Ullmark.According to Sportskeeda, David Pastrnak and Rebecca Rohlsson have two children as of now. Their daughter, Freya Ivy Pastrnak, was born in June 2023. Pastrnak faced a massive low in his life when the couple lost their baby. They also had a son, named Viggo Rohl Pastrnak, who tragically passed away just six days after his birth in June 2021.As per reports, Rebecca Rohlsson is an event planner and social media influencer, even though her personal wealth is on the smaller side. If you add up their assets, the couple’s total net worth is over $80 million, according to the latest reports from trustworthy sources. Rebecca Rohlsson's social media account on Instagram @rohlsson includes 102 posts, with 86.2k followers and 341 people in following, as of December 2025.
Article Summary: David pastrnak is a czech professional ice hockey right winger and alternate captain for the boston bruins of the nhl. In 2023, he signed an eight-year, $90 million deal with the bruins. He married rebecca rohlsson last year, and it was a private affair between close friends and family members.

Article Title: World Athletics president Sebastian Coe backs new British hope as his iconic 800m record gets worthy opponent in Ben Hoggins after 50 years
Article Text:
Sebastian Coe (via Getty Images)

Sebastian Coe’s words fuel belief in Britain’s next middle-distance star Ben Hoggins



Sebastian Coe: The Record-Breaking Legend Behind World Athletics #shorts

Some athletic records seem untouchable. Sebastian Coe ’s British 800-metre record of 1:41.73, set in 1981, is one of them. For almost 50 years, it has stood as the standard for every British middle-distance runner. Now, the conversation is shifting as new talent emerges and belief grows that the mark could finally fall.That belief has been backed by Coe himself. The World Athletics President has publicly praised the 23-year-old Olympian Ben Hoggins. His comments have added serious weight to growing expectations around British middle-distance running. With Scotland producing world champions and confidence rising across the squad, the moment feels right for a challenge to one of the sport’s greatest national records.Sebastian Coe has rarely spoken so openly about a young British runner. His praise for Hoggins reflects more than talent. It highlights mindset and belief. Speaking to Athletics Weekly, Coe said, “He’s very talented, and you need to win things and with that comes an infectious confidence.”He then compared Hoggins to Britain’s current stars and said, “I’ve seen that with Jake (Wightman) and Josh (Kerr) as well. You need to get up onto pole position ,and sometimes the rest of your career just follows.It’s a psychological breakthrough as much as anything.”Britain is currently enjoying a golden era in middle-distance running. Wightman ended a 38-year wait for a men’s 1500m world title in 2022. Kerr followed by winning the world championship a year later. Both victories echoed the dominance of Coe’s own era.While Hoggins looks to the future, another British runner has already come close to Coe’s record. At the 2025 World Championships in Tokyo, Max Burgin ran a personal best of 1:42.29. That time was just 0.56 seconds away from the legendary mark.The race was described by Coe as a “proper, proper 800m race.” It was fast from the opening lap. The pace helped push Burgin to a new level. After the race, Burgin said he now feels “comfortable at that low 1:42” and added that it “makes sense next year to be pushing to those 1:41s.”That performance showed the record is no longer safe. With Burgin closing in and Hoggins earning Coe’s trust, British athletics may finally be approaching a historic run.Also Read: Adam Peaty and Holly Ramsay escape to Lapland for holidays ahead of wedding amid family drama and swimmer’s mom's 60th birthday
Article Summary: Sebastian coe's british 800-metre record of 1:41.73 is no longer safe. World athletics president has publicly praised the 23-year-old olympian ben hoggins. With scotland producing world champions and confidence rising across the squad, the moment feels right for a challenge.
